Subject: Decision Document approval notification
The RFA Decision Document has been approved by the Grants Office and now requires you to send notifications to applicants. Below are the details:
RFA Number: {!Announcement__c.Name}
RFA Title: {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementName__c}

Sincerely,
EGMS Team
